title: The Iron Giant

text: You shoot andthe whole thing starts over.
title: The Iron Giant

text: Stop it now!Our future's at stake!
title: The Iron Giant

text: Which is why you have got to stop.
title: The Iron Giant

text: Hold your fire! The boy's alive?
title: The Iron Giant

text: It's targeted tothe giant's current position!
title: The Iron Giant

text: We can duck and cover.There's a shelter right there.
title: The Iron Giant

text: There's no way to survive this,you idiot!
title: The Iron Giant

text: You mean, we're all going to--
title: The Iron Giant

text: To die, Mansley, for our country.
title: The Iron Giant

text: Screw our country! I want to live!
title: The Iron Giant

text: Make sure he stays here,like a good soldier.
title: The Iron Giant

text: -Shouldn't we get to a shelter?-It wouldn't matter.
title: The Iron Giant

text: You are who you choose to be.
title: The Iron Giant

text: Your best work yet, honey.No doubt about it.
title: The Iron Giant

text: You think this is my best? Really?
title: The Iron Giant

text: You know, next to that bug thing.
title: The Iron Giant

text: You know, the one with the shovels. . . .
title: The Iron Giant

text: Come on, honey. Time to go.
title: The Iron Giant

text: He said it wasthe only part recovered.
title: The Iron Giant

text: He thought you should have it.
title: The Iron Giant
